name: Cave Digger
description: Cave Digger is a free virtual reality mining game for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows MR. Buy Cave Digger: Riches DLC expansion for the full experience of Cave Digger western world and to support the developers!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Storage: 400 MB available space
